questions.quote: Oh, sure she was; Asked me where the 'humor' section was? Humor? Come on.
I can't believe this. So what are you saying? You didn't like my act, so that's it?
Hey, Poppie...you really think people wanna make their own pizza?
I know, but don't say anything to anyone. He told me not to tell you.
You know you should keep in touch. Something may be opening up in a few weeks. Is that a Bruline?
You know, it's strange, because he's such an honest mechanic.
Well, I got the tools. I got the pillows. All I need is the lumber.
Because, I was thinking... are you at all concerned that living in the same building will, y'know... cramp our styles?
Oh, that's a dangerous fruit. It's like a weapon that thing, got spikes on the end. You can get killed from one of those things.
Don't you understand the very thought, the very idea, I'll never be comfortable again.
